en.dataPrivacy: Data Privacy in Red Hat Insights for Managing Red Hat Enterprise Linus Enviroments
en.insightsIsDesigned: Insights is designed to work with minimal data.
en.insightsIsDesignedBody: Red Hat Insights collects only te minimum system metadata that is needed to analyze and identify issues in your Red Hat Enterprise Linus enviroments.
en.youControlWhat: You control what data is sent to Red Hat for analysis.
en.youControlWhatBody: Before data is sent, you have the option to inspect and redact information.
en.dataIsEncrypted: Data is encrypted throughout the processess, with a customizable collection schedule.
en.dataIsEncryptedBody: Red Hat signs its data collection rules and will abort if the signature cannot be verified.
en.onlyOneUploaded: Only one uploaded data set is stored at a time.
en.onlyOneUploadedBody: For each REHL host or instance, one uploaded data set is stored on the services infrastructure.
